original_text: But when you stand up to pray, first you must forgive other people. If anyone has done something bad against you, forgive that person. If you do forgive them, your Father in heaven will forgive you. God will forgive you for the bad things that you have done.’ 26
korean_text: 서서 기도할 때에 아무에게나 혐의가 있거든 용서하라 그리하여야 하늘에 계신 너희 아버지께서도 너희 허물을 사하여 주시리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But when you stand up to pray,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신이 기도하기 위해 일어설 때,

sentences.original_text: first you must forgive other people.
If anyone has done something bad against you,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 당신에게 나쁜 일을 했다면,

sentences.original_text: your Father in heaven will forgive you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘에 계신 당신의 아버지께서 당신을 용서하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: God will forgive you for the bad things that you have done.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 당신이 행한 나쁜 일들을 용서하실 것입니다.
